import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { Router } from '@angular/router' @Component({ selector: 'app-add-products', templateUrl: './add-products.component.html', styleUrls: ['./add-products.component.css'] }) export class AddProductsComponent { constructor( private router:Router, ){} addProduct(){ this.router.navigate(['/seller']) } }
